questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using infrastructure as code (IaC)?
options: It requires you to specify all of the settings of your infrastructure resources for each deployment, supporting greater customization.
You can deploy the same infrastructure for developer and test environments.
It decreases your reliance on available programming skills by letting you rely on infrastructure skill sets.
It creates reliable architectures by preventing the convenient deletion of infrastructure resources.
correct_answers: You can deploy the same infrastructure for developer and test environments.
